name: The Life of Winston S.
description:
The Life of Winston S. is a dialogue heavy dystopian adventure game based on 1984 by George Orwell.

The year is 1984, or so you have been told. Truth does no longer equal facts, so the year could be anything. You are Winston S, a member of the outer party and in service of Big Brother. Your task: ensuring the safety of the inhabitants of the city. To do so, you are tasked with checking camera footage for suspicious activities, and reporting them to the authorities. Always remember:

Big Brother is Watching

Language: English/Dutch

Game designed for a 1920x1080 resolution, should work on other resolutions, but that's not confirmed.

Select dialogue options using the 1,2,3 (keyboard) keys.

Music from www.bensound.com
